#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
   int T,len,i;
   
   cin>>T;
   cout<<"\n";
   
   for(i=0;i<T;i++)
   {
     cin>>len;
     cout<<"\n";
     
     if(len%2==1)
     {
       len=len-1;
       cout<<len<<endl;
     }
     else
       cout<<len<<endl;
     
   }   
   return 0;
}
